long_description: These lightweight pedals feature an open pattern that helps shed mud for worry-free riding. Fluorine-coated binding claws allow for easy entry and release. Pedals are dual-sided for easy entry and feature strong, durable CrMo spindles with 8mm Allen wrench mounts. Low-maintenance sealed bearing cartridge axles. Dual-sided tension adjustment.
short_description: These lightweight pedals feature an open pattern that helps shed mud for worry-free riding.
